title: [Linux] Old Ported Games Collection
description:
A collection of old Linux ports. Some good, others not so much. Lots of them done by Loki Software. Couldn't have these vanishing into the digital void now could we?

Installers from LIfLG.org included.

Getting them to work is up to you. I AM NOT YOUR TECH SUPPORT.
